data.Name: Widespread Panic
data.Bio: Widespread Panic is a rock band which formed in Athens, Georgia, United States in 1986. The band currently consists of John Bell (vocals, guitar), Jimmy Herirng (guitar), Dave Schools (bass), John "JoJo" Hermann (keyboards), Domingo "Sunny" Ortiz (percussion) and Todd Nance (drums). The band has previously included Michael Houser (guitar) and George McConnell (guitar) and have released 11 albums. Michael Houser and John Bell ('JB') met at the University of Georgia at Athens between 1982 and 1984 Read more on Last.fm
